IR_CTU.plutus_representation: (\ct preset enable -> if enable then min (ct + 1) preset else ct)

IR_CTD.plutus_representation: (\ct preset enable -> if enable then max (ct - 1) 0 else ct)

IR_CTUD.plutus_representation: (\ct up down preset -> if up then min (ct + 1) preset else if down then max (ct - 1) 0 else ct)
